name: getScoreRevisionData
description:
Retrieve the file corresponding to a score revision (the following formats are available): Flat JSON/Adagio JSON `json`, MusicXML
`mxl`/`xml`, MP3 `mp3`, WAV `wav`, MIDI `midi`, a tumbnail of the first page `thumbnail.png` or auto sync points `synchronizationPoints`.

sharingKey.description: This sharing key must be specified to access to a score or collection with a `privacy` mode set to `privateLink` and the current user is not a collaborator of the document.

parts.description:
An optional a set of parts uuid to be exported. This parameter must be composed of parts uuids
separated by commas. For example "59df645f-bb1c-f1b4-b573-d2afc4491f94,34ef645f-1aef-f3bc-1564-34cca4492b87".

onlyCached.description:
Only return files already generated and cached in Flat's production
cache. If the file is not availabe, a 404 will be returned

url.description: Returns a json with the `url` in it instead of redirecting

score.description: Unique identifier of the score document. This can be a Flat Score unique identifier (i.e. `ScoreDetails.id`) or, if the score is also a Google Drive file, the Drive file unique identifier prefixed with `drive-` (e.g. `drive-0B000000000`).

revision.description: Unique identifier of a score revision. You can use `last` to fetch the information related to the last version created.

format.description: The format of the file you will retrieve

**id**: An unique error identifier generated for the request
**message**: A printable message for this message
**param**: The related parameter that caused the error
